truth: -  "Cardiology is a branch of medicine that deals with diseases and disorders of the heart and the blood vessels."
fiction: -  "Cardiology is a branch of culinary arts that deals with the preparation and presentation of heart-shaped desserts and blood orange beverages."

truth: -  "Atherosclerosis is a condition in which plaque builds up inside the arteries, leading to heart disease."
fiction: -  "Atherosclerosis is a condition in which plaque builds up inside the arteries, leading to an increased ability to play the piano."

truth: -  "An electrocardiogram (ECG) is a medical test that detects heart abnormalities by measuring the electrical activity generated by the heart as it contracts."
fiction: -  "An electrocardiogram (ECG) is a musical instrument that creates symphonies by measuring the electrical activity generated by the heart as it contracts."

truth: -  "Coronary artery disease (CAD) is the most common type of heart disease and is the leading cause of death in the United States in both men and women."
fiction: -  "Coronary artery disease (CAD) is the most common type of dance and is the leading cause of spontaneous dance-offs in the United States in both men and women."

truth: -  "Heart failure, also known as congestive heart failure, occurs when your heart muscle doesn't pump blood as well as it should."
fiction: -  "Heart failure, also known as congestive heart failure, occurs when your heart muscle doesn't pump out enough love poems as it should."

truth: -  "Cardiac arrest is a sudden loss of blood flow resulting from the failure of the heart to effectively pump."
fiction: -  "Cardiac arrest is a sudden loss of artistic inspiration resulting from the failure of the heart to effectively pump out creative ideas."

truth: -  "A pacemaker is a small device that's placed under the skin in your chest to help control your heartbeat."
fiction: -  "A pacemaker is a small device that's placed under the skin in your chest to help control your ability to pace back and forth."

truth: -  "Hypertension, or high blood pressure, can lead to severe complications and increases the risk of heart disease, stroke, and death."
fiction: -  "Hypertension, or high blood pressure, can lead to severe superpowers and increases the risk of becoming a superhero, saving the world, and living forever."

truth: -  "Angina is a type of chest pain caused by reduced blood flow to the heart."
fiction: -  "Angina is a type of chest pain caused by reduced flow of romantic feelings to the heart."

truth: -  "A heart transplant is a surgical procedure performed to replace a diseased heart with a healthy one from a donor."
fiction: -  "A heart transplant is a magical procedure performed to replace a broken heart with a happy one from a unicorn."

truth: -  "Cardiomyopathy refers to diseases of the heart muscle causing it to become enlarged, thick, or rigid."
fiction: -  "Cardiomyopathy refers to diseases of the heart muscle causing it to become an excellent singer, dancer, or actor."

truth: -  "A stent is a small mesh tube that’s used to treat narrow or weak arteries."
fiction: -  "A stent is a small mesh tube that’s used to amplify weak radio signals."

truth: -  "Atrial fibrillation is an irregular and often rapid heart rate that can increase your risk of strokes, heart failure and other heart-related complications."
fiction: -  "Atrial fibrillation is an irregular and often rapid heart rate that can increase your risk of becoming a world-class sprinter, marathon runner, and other athletics-related achievements."
